table.name: vtiger_bhsorders
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsorders` ( `bhsorderid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsorder_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsorderid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsorderscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsorderscf` ( `bhsorderid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsorderid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
